comment._content: Love the richness of the colors!

comment.author: 82849855@N00
comment._content:
Interesting that this photographer took so many pictures of this mine.
It is really an ugly blotch on this beautiful area--unless you count the gold it produced.  Now it's just part of the history.
The colors in this photograph seem better preserved than the rest.

comment.author: 82562150@N00
comment._content: interesting to see what it looked like when it was all new and shiny.
